backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented UI and search enhancements along with affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variable file defining placeholder API keys for OpenWeatherMap and Google Maps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layers defining extensive CSS variable theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring the root element and loading the main React application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling client-side navigation between app pages using local state.
frontend/src/components/ContinentalMap.t: Interactive world map component with SVG continent hit‑zones, hover/selection styling, and red marker projection.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor instance based on the current authenticated identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark ocean themes plus global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/cityDistrictDataset.ts: Provides a dataset of major cities and districts with coordinates and a helper for fuzzy name lookup.
frontend/src/lib/continentDataset.ts: Contains sample environmental metrics for continents and a lookup function for matching by name.
frontend/src/lib/countryStateDataset.ts: Lists countries and US states with coordinates for location search and mapping.
frontend/src/lib/environmentData.ts: Fetches temperature from OpenWeather and water-quality metrics from USGS, assembling normalized environment data.
frontend/src/lib/fishingZoneHeuristics.t: Implements heuristic scoring for coral health and generates fish availability and hazard risk descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/seaOceanDataset.ts: Defines a sea and ocean dataset with coordinates and a lookup function supporting case-insensitive and partial name matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AuthedLandingPage.tsx: Displays authenticated user info from Internet Identity and shows a dashboard-style landing page.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatePage.tsx: Provides a form to input water parameters and computes a coral health index with impacts and suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/CommentPage.tsx: Implements a form for posting ocean-related comments and manages an in-memory comment list with deletion.
frontend/src/pages/FishingZonePage.tsx: Searches seas, oceans, or locations, fetches environmental data, computes heuristics, and displays fishing-zone insights.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleMapPage.tsx: Provides a search-driven map page that locates continents or seas/oceans, fetches environmental data, and updates markers and displayed metrics.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main baby‑blue themed homepage with navigation buttons to other app sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login form with basic client-side validation and triggers onLogin without real authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Implements a profile settings form with image upload, localStorage persistence, and editable personal data fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, animations, and theme settings, including custom ocean and baby‑blue palettes.
project_state.json: Stores meta-information about the project’s structure, features, themes, and architectural notes for build planning.
